rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: North-facing entrance with a welcoming facade, incorporating Vastu principles for energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with Chettinad-style decor and modern lighting.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, ideal for family gatherings.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest room for visiting family and friends.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet library space with built-in shelves and ample natural light.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Comfortable living area for staff, integrated within the ground floor.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Efficiently designed kitchen with open plan layout and ventilation following local norms.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned to the north as per Vastu principles, providing positive energy flow.
Large windows for ample natural light and ventilation.

openings.location: Between Living Room and Dining Area
openings.description: Sliding door connecting the living and dining spaces.

rooms.name: Children Bedrooms
rooms.description: Two-bedroom suite for children, with privacy and adequate storage.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom for family members or a home office.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Full bathroom attached to bedrooms, ensuring convenience.

openings.description: Interior staircase with balustrades for safe vertical circulation.
Balcony windows providing natural light and ventilation.

additional_features.name: Patio/Verandah
additional_features.description: Open patio area for gatherings and relaxation, designed with Chettinad elements.
